Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I think genAi is some times more efficient than tutor, especially on more basic and common sense questions. But not every major ai is good at it, but at least math questions ai is very good at it

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedbacks given by ai are sometimes very general, while those given by teachers are very specific.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The feedback given by ai will be a lot more general besides, and may have many points, some important and some not. The teacher will basically just tell you the key points
